name: @rivalis/core
description: Rivalis, scalable & scriptable multiplayer game logic framework

scripts.dev: npm run test && npm run run:server
scripts.run:server: nodemon -w src -w example --ignore example/client/client.js --exec "npm run build:client && babel-node example/server/index.js"
scripts.build:client: parcel build example/client/index.js --target browser --no-minify --no-source-maps --bundle-node-modules -d example/client --out-file client.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run prepublish:build && npm run prepublish:typeGen
scripts.prepublish:build: npx rmdir-cli lib && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: npm run test:linter && npm run test:unit

author: Daniel Kalevski
